about_the_game:
* Synopsis *

「The more we know, the more ignorant we are.」

It is the golden age of discovery. The Industrial Revolution has recently displayed its might, and with the advent of many new technologies, human knowledge has expanded at an unprecedented rate to create new frontiers.

Yan, a natural history student, has been assigned by chance to do research at a remote observation post nestled in the mountains.

「Although the work is monotonous, I will not be able to make a great finding if I give up along the way.」

With this belief, he sets out on the journey to discovery.

What fate lies ahead for him as he ventures into the unknown?

*Game Features*

  • Live2D sprites in vivid detail (especially the ears and tail!)

  • Matching lip animations with the voiced dialogue

  • Elaborate CGs

  • Semi-Dynamic Visuals

* The Cast *

Mori

CV: Tsuburagi Sawco

Age: 18 / Height: 163cm

A feisty fox spirit who has been living in a shrine in the mountains with the Divine Fox since she was a child. She has little knowledge of the humans and is curious to learn more about them.

The Divine Fox

CV: Kureha Miu

Age: Seemingly around 25, although her actual age is a mystery. / Height: 168cm

A dignified fox spirit with godlike powers. She lives with Mori and cares for her, but lacks the ability to express her good intentions.

Perhaps she has seen much of the world, which could explain her reclusive nature.

Special thanks to:

woosk from Visual novel, JRPG, Anime and partner website Sinical Network for their excellent work on the English subtitles.

short_description: Yan, a student of natural history, encounters a cute and mysterious girl with fox ears while conducting routine scientific research at a remote observation cabin. This might be a "blessing" for the intrepid in the golden age of geographical discovery...
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian
